channel.title: User Agents on Jake Learns Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in User Agents on Jake Learns Data Science

item.title: Understanding User Agents
item.description: INTRODUCTION I have had a few discussions around web user agents at work recently. It turns out that they are not straightforward at all. In other words, trying to report browser usage to our Business Unit required a nontrivial translation. The more I dug in, the more I learned. I had some challenges finding the information, so I thought it be useful to document my findings and centralizing the sites I used to figure all this out.
